doc-47ec1882e8832141c0014b0d210e5130.content: To create compelling characters: Give them clear goals and motivations. Create meaningful flaws that drive conflict. Show character growth through actions, not just dialogue. Make supporting characters distinct and purposeful.
doc-47ec1882e8832141c0014b0d210e5130.content_summary: To create compelling characters: Give them clear goals and motivations. Create meaningful flaws that drive conflict. Show character growth through actions, not just dialogue. Make supporting characters distinct and purposeful.
